first.title: Senior Software Engineer
first.description: Specialized in .NET Core and modern web technologies

mainContent.part1: I am a Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing enterprise-level applications. My expertise lies in .NET Core, React, and modern web technologies.
mainContent.part2: Throughout my career, I've worked on various projects ranging from e-commerce platforms to complex system integrations. I'm passionate about creating efficient, scalable solutions that solve real-world problems.
mainContent.part3: I hold a Master's degree in Software Engineering from Middle East Technical University, where I deepened my understanding of software architecture and design patterns.

descriptions.first: The vessels are equipped with multiple engines and send data at specified intervals. The app analyzes the time-series data from the configured vessels. Our algorithms continuously evaluate this data and use it to generate recommendations.
descriptions.second: Involved in the development and maintenance of the Tekomar XPERT product.
descriptions.third: Refactoring the TimeSeries implementation to meet the specific requirements of a customer.
descriptions.fourth: Containerizing the newly developed approach using Docker.
descriptions.fifth: Deploying the Docker image onto an intranet server and conducting evaluations within that environment.

descriptions.first: As a team lead, collaborated with a team of five individuals, applying the Scrum methodology to develop three projects: Project Management Plan project, Prioritization, and Performance.
descriptions.second: Successfully delivered all three projects within one-year timeframe, utilizing the following technologies: .NET Core 5, React, Redux Toolkit, PostGre SQL, and Material UI.
descriptions.third: Managed both customer relations and team coordination effectively.
descriptions.fourth: Provided valuable consultancy to the customer, specifically focusing on .Net Development.
descriptions.fifth: Supported the customer, Aselsan, one of the most important defense industry companies in Türkiye, in achieving their project goals and requirements.

descriptions.first: Developed and maintained a disaster risk management system for the Ministry of Environment and Urban Planning using .Net MVC, MSSql DB, and JavaScript (September 2020 - May 2021).
descriptions.second: Contributed to the development and maintenance of a staff management system for the Turkish Court of Accounts, utilizing .Net MVC 5, Oracle DB, MSSql DB, Postgre SQL, JavaScript, and jQuery (February 2020 - September 2020).
descriptions.third: Collaborated on a GIS-focused web application, specifically a Map Widget, using React and JavaScript (May 2019 - February 2020).
descriptions.fourth: Conducted unit testing, addressed issues identified by SonarQube, refactored methods and classes for single responsibility, and upgraded code to Java 8 (July 2018 - May 2019).
descriptions.fifth: Led the refactoring of a GIS project in Java for an outsourced project at Havelsan (July 2018 - May 2019).

first.title: BookStore
first.description: This is the implementation of a Bookstore system as part of an MSc. Software Engineering Senior Project. It is a secondhand book selling and ordering application. The project utilizes a range of technologies and demonstrates skills in software development, architecture design, and project management.

second.title: Assets API
second.description: This project implements a simple service that provides information about different assets available on the market. The service reads information about assets from a CSV file and provides various endpoints for asset management. The assets are defined by name and ID, with each asset described by a predefined list of properties.

third.title: GeoJson Features
third.description: The application retrieves features from OpenStreetMap using the OSM API, converts the XML data to GeoJSON format with osmtogeojson.js, and parses it into a list of GeoJSON features for use in the Web UI.

fourth.title: Mars Robotic Moves
fourth.description: This project is a coding exercise to improve clean coding and abstraction skills by simulating robot navigation on a bounded grid representing Mars. Robots follow instructions (L, R, F), with "LOST" robots leaving a scent to prevent repeated falls. The program processes each robot sequentially and outputs their final positions.

fifth.title: Order Integration API
fifth.description: Integration API is a small POC solution designed to process supplier-side orders through flat file integration, price validation, stock management, and ERP system communication. The system handles fixed-length order documents (.sdf files) and performs comprehensive validation and processing workflows.

sixth.title: Smart Charging PoC
sixth.description: A small POC application with a RESTful API implementation for managing electric vehicle charging stations, groups, and connectors with capacity management.

first.title: Grocery Web App
first.description: Architected and developed a comprehensive e-commerce solution for a grocery business startup. Implemented full-stack development using ASP.NET MVC, creating a scalable architecture that handled inventory management, order processing, and user authentication. Designed and implemented both customer-facing interfaces and administrative dashboards, ensuring a seamless shopping experience.

second.title: Orbit Crypto
second.description: Led frontend development for a cryptocurrency platform specializing in token launches and funding operations. Engineered robust wallet integration systems and implemented complex blockchain interactions using React. Developed intuitive user interfaces for token management, funding operations, and real-time cryptocurrency tracking.

third.title: Wholesale E-commerce Platform
third.description: Spearheaded full-stack development of a wholesale e-commerce platform, focusing on B2B transactions. Implemented complex database queries for bulk order processing and integrated multiple third-party services for payment processing, shipping, and e-invoice management. Developed responsive user interfaces optimized for wholesale operations.

first.title: ASP .NET Web Application Development (.NET Core) Certificate

fifth.title: Asp .NET C#, SQL and Web Forms Software Specialist Certificate
